title: Big Mama

description.plain: “Big Mama” by Latto is just such a strong anthem, from which self-assurance and success breathe, and women show the clear capacity for self-support. Latto puts it this way in this song: through her confident lyrics and persona, she does not simply celebrate accomplishments but provokes others to light them up in order to become great. This record speaks volumes regarding Latto’s impact on hip-hop and the strong women’s empowerment which is brought into the culture.

embed_content: Read “Big Mama” by Latto on Genius

album.full_title: Sugar Honey Iced Tea by Latto

Latto puts it this way in this song: through her confident lyrics and persona, she does not simply celebrate accomplishments but provokes others to light them up in order to become great. This record speaks volumes regarding Latto’s impact on hip-hop and the strong women’s empowerment which is brought into the culture.
